name: Island Tribe Free
description:
On a small island in the middle of the ocean, there once lived a forgotten tribe. The inhabitants of the island lived a carefree and quiet life and everything seemed to be perfect, until one day a great volcano woke up. As the sky spewed lava and ash, the villagers abandoned their homes and ran for their lives. They headed for the ocean, making their way through treacherous mountains, wild jungle and deep swamps in order to escape from the island. Help the settlers reach the ocean before the volcano strikes its final blow and hot lava gulps the island down!

Features:

- Pick-up-and -play type of game
- Incredible action and fast-paced gameplay
- 30 challenging levels in 3 colorful episodes
- Beautiful graphics and animations
- Strategy and time management gameplay

Make all haste you can! Escape from a doomed island!

Grab it while you can, and TELL YOUR FRIENDS!

Enjoy Realore Games at http://www.realore.com
